titleStmt.title: Advice to a young lord written by his father ...
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1657-1710.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for, and are to be sold by R. Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Adaptation of: Instructions to a son / Archibald Cambell, Marquis of Argyll. Sometimes attributed to Thomas Fairfax, Baron Fairfax. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
